description:
Serving the injured and disabled throughout Berkeley County and the surrounding areas from our law office in Goose Creek, South Carolina, the attorneys at The Steinberg Law Firm are fully prepared to help you recover the full amount of compensation and benefits you deserve in the wake of a debilitating injury or devastating loss. As such, we offer exceptional representation for all types of claims involving serious personal injury and workers' compensation.

Originally established in 1927, our law firm has grown to include three total offices throughout South Carolina's Lowcountry, and for more than 90 years now, we have been the trusted source for innocent accident victims, injured workers and those suffering from a disability that prevents them from working.

Our dedicated attorneys possess more than 170 of combined legal experience, and we have achieved unprecedented success assisting our clients with recovering the compensation they need to support themselves and their families. Over the past 10 years alone, we have secured more than $500 million in settlements and awards for our plaintiff clients, earning our reputation as one of the region's top law firms for personal injury and workers' compensation.

Devoted to helping you through your difficult and uncertain time, we promise to work closely with you to fully understand your situation and your unique needs so that we can devise the most effective strategy to help you obtain the favorable outcomes you expect. At all times, we will treat you and your family with compassion and respect as we fight hard to help you secure a brighter future.

Whether your claim is the result of a motor vehicle accident, an act of medical malpractice or any other act of negligence, or if you need assistance filing or appealing your workers' compensation or SSDI claims, you can find your personal legal advocate at The Steinberg Law Firm. To receive a free initial consultation concerning your matter, you can contact our office to schedule an appointment.
